text: Derry is an unincorporated community located in Sierra County, New Mexico, United States. Derry is located on New Mexico State Road 187 northwest of Hatch. Derry has a post office with ZIP code 87933, which opened on August 11, 1911. The town was named after Derry, Ireland, which was suggested by a former soldier. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Sierra County, New Mexico Category:Unincorporated communities in New Mexico
title: Derry, New Mexico
